properties.areaDesc: Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains; Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains; Northeast Bighorn Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 1 at 2:15PM MST until February 4 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2
feet.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana,
Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains and Pryor/Northern Bighorn
Mountains.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by
heavy accumulating snowfall. Expect difficult travel conditions
on Highway 14 through the Bighorn Mountains.
properties.instruction:
For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY
